markdown.markdown: ```{r} #| label: fn #| echo: false enlink_fa <- function(link, fa) { if (link == "") return(" ") paste0("[", fontawesome::fa(fa), "](", link, ")") } ``` Almost everything listed on this page was built for the sake of my own learning. Quality and completeness are variable. No guarantees. Selected packages. All are hosted on GitHub. Many are [on my R-universe](https://matt-dray.r-universe.dev/). ### Useful Made to serve a 'real' purpose. Other people could feasibly find them useful. Nothing grandiose. Alphabetical. ```{r} #| label: packages-prep #| echo: false pkgs <- read.csv("resources/packages.csv") pkgs$links <- paste( lapply(pkgs$source_url, \(x) enlink_fa(x, "github")), lapply(pkgs$blog_url, \(x) enlink_fa(x, "pencil")) ) pkgs$name <- ifelse( pkgs$language == "R", paste0("{", pkgs$name, "}"), pkgs$name ) names(pkgs) <- names(pkgs) |> tools::toTitleCase() ``` ```{r} #| label: r-packages-useful #| echo: false pkgs[ pkgs$Language == "R" & pkgs$Category == "Useful", c("Name", "Description", "Links") ] |> knitr::kable(row.names = FALSE) ``` ### Conceptual Experiments, games, hacks, memes and subversion. Alphabetical. ```{r} #| label: r-packages-concept #| echo: false pkgs[ pkgs$Language == "R" & pkgs$Category == "Concept", c("Name", "Description", "Links") ] |> knitr::kable(row.names = FALSE) ``` ## Python tools ```{r} #| label: py-packages #| echo: false pkgs[ pkgs$Language == "Python", c("Name", "Description", "Links") ] |> knitr::kable(row.names = FALSE) ``` ## Shiny apps ### Hosted ```{r} #| label: shiny-shinyapps #| echo: false tibble::tribble( ~Name, ~Description, ~Links, # "Animal Crossing Popularity Contest", "Swipe left or right on villagers from Nintendo’s Animal Crossing", paste( enlink_fa("https://mattdray.shinyapps.io/acnh-swipe/", "globe"), enlink_fa("https://github.com/matt-dray/acnh-swipe", "github"), enlink_fa("https://www.rostrum.blog/posts/2022-01-07-acnh-swipe-results/", "pencil") ), # "LeWitt ReMix", "Remix Sol LeWitt's art for #RecreationThursday", paste( enlink_fa("https://mattdray.shinyapps.io/lewitt-remix-app/", "globe"), enlink_fa("https://github.com/matt-dray/viz-recreation/tree/main/2021-07-01_rt_lewitt/lewitt-remix-app/", "github"), enlink_fa("https://www.rostrum.blog/posts/2021-07-05-recreate-lewitt/", "pencil") ), # "Randoflag", "A randomised flag challenge for new browser tabs", paste( enlink_fa("https://mattdray.shinyapps.io/randoflag/", "globe"), enlink_fa("https://github.com/matt-dray/randoflag/", "github"), enlink_fa("https://www.rostrum.blog/posts/2021-03-02-randoflag/", "pencil") ), # "What’s your Hadley number?", "Find shortest paths to Hadley Wickham in the CRAN authorship graph", paste( enlink_fa("https://mattdray.shinyapps.io/hadley-number/", "globe"), enlink_fa("https://github.com/matt-dray/hadley-number/", "github"), enlink_fa("https://www.rostrum.blog/posts/2019-02-27-hadley-number/", "pencil") ) ) |> knitr::kable() ``` ### Shinylive Serverless. Runs entirely in your browser. ```{r} #| label: shiny-shinylive #| echo: false tibble::tribble( ~Name, ~Description, ~Links, # "CRAN deadlines", "See which CRAN packages are at threat of archival", paste( enlink_fa("https://matt-dray.github.io/cran-deadlines/", "globe"), enlink_fa("https://github.com/matt-dray/cran-deadlines/", "github"), enlink_fa("https://www.rostrum.blog/posts/2024-06-12-cran-db/", "pencil") ), # "Govspeakify tables", "Convert a pasted table to Govspeak-flavoured Markdown", paste( enlink_fa("https://matt-dray.github.io/govspeakify-tables/", "globe"), enlink_fa("https://github.com/matt-dray/govspeakify-tables/", "github"), enlink_fa("https://www.rostrum.blog/posts/2023-10-08-govspeakify-tables/", "pencil") ), # "Little pixel fun zone", "A small interactive pixel-editor toy for the browser", paste( enlink_fa("https://matt-dray.github.io/little-pixel-fun-zone/", "globe"), enlink_fa("https://github.com/matt-dray/little-pixel-fun-zone/", "github"), enlink_fa("https://www.rostrum.blog/posts/2024-09-15-shiny-pixel/", "pencil") ), # "Not Balatro", "Drag-and-drop card gaming in R with {sortable}?", paste( enlink_fa("https://matt-dray.github.io/not-balatro/", "globe"), enlink_fa("https://github.com/matt-dray/not-balatro/", "github"), enlink_fa("https://www.rostrum.blog/posts/2024-10-25-not-balatro/", "pencil") ), ) |> knitr::kable() ``` ### Not hosted You'll have to download and run them yourself. ```{r} #| label: shiny-not-hosted #| echo: false tibble::tribble( ~Name, ~Description, ~Links, # "Ages at World Cup 2018", "You're really old and sports people are younger than you", paste( enlink_fa("https://github.com/matt-dray/wc18-age/", "github"), enlink_fa("https://www.rostrum.blog/2018/07/17/world-cup-age-app/", "pencil") ), # "Deer-vehicle collisions in Scotland", "Explore open data on deer strikes in Scotland, 2000 to 2017", paste( enlink_fa("https://github.com/matt-dray/scot-deer-collisions/", "github"), enlink_fa("https://www.rostrum.blog/2019/01/18/deer-collisions/", "pencil") ), # "Mission Across IOW", "How hard is it to cross the Isle of Wight, UK, in a straight line?", paste( enlink_fa("https://github.com/matt-dray/mission-across-iow/", "github"), enlink_fa("https://www.rostrum.blog/2021/05/22/mission-across-iow/", "pencil") ), # "Read a colour hex code", "Test yourself at reading colour hex codes by eye ", paste( enlink_fa("https://github.com/matt-dray/dehex-challenge/", "github"), enlink_fa("https://www.rostrum.blog/2021/08/10/dehex/", "pencil") ), # "Tidyquiz", "A {learnr} hack to generate a random {tidyverse} functions quiz", paste( enlink_fa("https://github.com/matt-dray/tidyquiz/", "github"), enlink_fa("https://www.rostrum.blog/posts/2019-03-18-tidyverse-quiz/", "pencil") ), ) |> knitr::kable() ``` ## Websites ```{r} #| label: websites #| echo: false tibble::tribble( ~Name, ~Description, ~Tools, ~Links, # "matt-dray.com", "This website", "Quarto, Netlify", paste( enlink_fa("https://www.matt-dray.com/", "globe"), enlink_fa("https://www.github.com/matt-dray/personal-site/", "github"), enlink_fa("https://www.rostrum.blog/posts/2020-12-08-postcard/", "pencil") ), # "rostrum.blog", "Japes with R: tutorials, ephemera, memes", "Quarto, Netlify", paste( enlink_fa("https://www.rostrum.blog/", "globe"), enlink_fa("https://www.github.com/matt-dray/rostrum-blog-2/", "github"), enlink_fa("https://www.rostrum.blog/posts/2023-08-26-cheerio-blogdown/", "pencil") ), # "Faxcrayon", "A gallery of recreations/remixes/original art", "RMarkdown, {bs4cards}, GitHub Pages", paste( enlink_fa("https://matt-dray.github.io/faxcrayon/", "globe"), enlink_fa("https://www.github.com/matt-dray/faxcrayon/", "github"), enlink_fa("https://www.rostrum.blog/posts/2021-07-25-faxcrayon/", "pencil") ), # "Hastings Half maps", "Interactive maps of the Hastings Half-Marathon route", "RMarkdown, {flexdashboard}, GitHub Pages", paste( enlink_fa("https://matt-dray.github.io/hastings-half/", "globe"), enlink_fa("https://github.com/matt-dray/hastings-half/", "github"), enlink_fa("https://www.rostrum.blog/posts/2022-03-31-hastings-half/", "pencil") ) ) |> knitr::kable() ``` ## Other Code-based bric-a-brac. Alphabetical. ```{r} #| label: other #| echo: false tibble::tribble( ~Name, ~Description, ~Links, # "Emojis to SVG", "Script to fetch SoftBank’s 1997 emoji set (the first-ever?) and convert them to SVG format", paste( enlink_fa("https://github.com/matt-dray/og-emoji-svg/", "github"), enlink_fa("https://www.rostrum.blog/posts/2021-07-31-og-emoji-svg/", "pencil") ), # "gamelad", "An RStudio theme to mimic the original GameBoy’s green palette", paste( enlink_fa("https://github.com/matt-dray/gamelad/", "github"), enlink_fa("https://www.rostrum.blog/posts/2021-01-04-safar6/", "pencil") ), # "GitHub Gists", "Snippets of code that solve a small problem and sometimes become blog posts", enlink_fa("https://gist.github.com/matt-dray/", "github"), # "Hex stickers", "Hexagonal sticker designs, mostly for R packages", enlink_fa("https://github.com/matt-dray/stickers/", "github"), # "londonmapbot", "A (retired) social media bot that posts MapBox satellite images, made with {rtoot} and GitHub Actions", paste( enlink_fa("https://botsin.space/@londonmapbot", "mastodon"), enlink_fa("https://twitter.com/londonmapbot", "twitter"), enlink_fa("https://github.com/matt-dray/londonmapbot/", "github"), enlink_fa("https://www.rostrum.blog/index.html#category=londonmapbot/", "pencil") ), # "Splendid R games", "A list of games made with R", paste( enlink_fa("https://github.com/matt-dray/splendid-r-games/", "github"), enlink_fa("https://www.rostrum.blog/posts/2023-04-02-splendid-r-games/", "pencil") ), # "Tidyswirl", "A work-in-progress introduction to the tidyverse created with {swirl}", paste( enlink_fa("https://github.com/matt-dray/tidyswirl/", "github"), enlink_fa("https://www.rostrum.blog/posts/2019-11-02-tidyswirl/", "pencil") ), # "Try R v4.2", "Try new features of R version 4.2 in the browser, thanks to Binder", paste( enlink_fa("https://mybinder.org/v2/gh/matt-dray/try-Rv4.2/main?urlpath=rstudio/", "globe"), enlink_fa("https://github.com/matt-dray/try-Rv4.2/", "github"), enlink_fa("https://www.rostrum.blog/posts/2022-06-01-try-r/", "pencil") ), ) |> knitr::kable() ```
markdown.srcMarkdownNoYaml: ```{r} #| label: fn #| echo: false enlink_fa <- function(link, fa) { if (link == "") return(" ") paste0("[", fontawesome::fa(fa), "](", link, ")") } ``` Almost everything listed on this page was built for the sake of my own learning. Quality and completeness are variable. No guarantees. ## R Packages Selected packages. All are hosted on GitHub. Many are [on my R-universe](https://matt-dray.r-universe.dev/). ### Useful Made to serve a 'real' purpose. Other people could feasibly find them useful. Nothing grandiose. Alphabetical. ```{r} #| label: packages-prep #| echo: false pkgs <- read.csv("resources/packages.csv") pkgs$links <- paste( lapply(pkgs$source_url, \(x) enlink_fa(x, "github")), lapply(pkgs$blog_url, \(x) enlink_fa(x, "pencil")) ) pkgs$name <- ifelse( pkgs$language == "R", paste0("{", pkgs$name, "}"), pkgs$name ) names(pkgs) <- names(pkgs) |> tools::toTitleCase() ``` ```{r} #| label: r-packages-useful #| echo: false pkgs[ pkgs$Language == "R" & pkgs$Category == "Useful", c("Name", "Description", "Links") ] |> knitr::kable(row.names = FALSE) ``` ### Conceptual Experiments, games, hacks, memes and subversion. Alphabetical. ```{r} #| label: r-packages-concept #| echo: false pkgs[ pkgs$Language == "R" & pkgs$Category == "Concept", c("Name", "Description", "Links") ] |> knitr::kable(row.names = FALSE) ``` ## Python tools ```{r} #| label: py-packages #| echo: false pkgs[ pkgs$Language == "Python", c("Name", "Description", "Links") ] |> knitr::kable(row.names = FALSE) ``` ## Shiny apps ### Hosted ```{r} #| label: shiny-shinyapps #| echo: false tibble::tribble( ~Name, ~Description, ~Links, # "Animal Crossing Popularity Contest", "Swipe left or right on villagers from Nintendo’s Animal Crossing", paste( enlink_fa("https://mattdray.shinyapps.io/acnh-swipe/", "globe"), enlink_fa("https://github.com/matt-dray/acnh-swipe", "github"), enlink_fa("https://www.rostrum.blog/posts/2022-01-07-acnh-swipe-results/", "pencil") ), # "LeWitt ReMix", "Remix Sol LeWitt's art for #RecreationThursday", paste( enlink_fa("https://mattdray.shinyapps.io/lewitt-remix-app/", "globe"), enlink_fa("https://github.com/matt-dray/viz-recreation/tree/main/2021-07-01_rt_lewitt/lewitt-remix-app/", "github"), enlink_fa("https://www.rostrum.blog/posts/2021-07-05-recreate-lewitt/", "pencil") ), # "Randoflag", "A randomised flag challenge for new browser tabs", paste( enlink_fa("https://mattdray.shinyapps.io/randoflag/", "globe"), enlink_fa("https://github.com/matt-dray/randoflag/", "github"), enlink_fa("https://www.rostrum.blog/posts/2021-03-02-randoflag/", "pencil") ), # "What’s your Hadley number?", "Find shortest paths to Hadley Wickham in the CRAN authorship graph", paste( enlink_fa("https://mattdray.shinyapps.io/hadley-number/", "globe"), enlink_fa("https://github.com/matt-dray/hadley-number/", "github"), enlink_fa("https://www.rostrum.blog/posts/2019-02-27-hadley-number/", "pencil") ) ) |> knitr::kable() ``` ### Shinylive Serverless. Runs entirely in your browser. ```{r} #| label: shiny-shinylive #| echo: false tibble::tribble( ~Name, ~Description, ~Links, # "CRAN deadlines", "See which CRAN packages are at threat of archival", paste( enlink_fa("https://matt-dray.github.io/cran-deadlines/", "globe"), enlink_fa("https://github.com/matt-dray/cran-deadlines/", "github"), enlink_fa("https://www.rostrum.blog/posts/2024-06-12-cran-db/", "pencil") ), # "Govspeakify tables", "Convert a pasted table to Govspeak-flavoured Markdown", paste( enlink_fa("https://matt-dray.github.io/govspeakify-tables/", "globe"), enlink_fa("https://github.com/matt-dray/govspeakify-tables/", "github"), enlink_fa("https://www.rostrum.blog/posts/2023-10-08-govspeakify-tables/", "pencil") ), # "Little pixel fun zone", "A small interactive pixel-editor toy for the browser", paste( enlink_fa("https://matt-dray.github.io/little-pixel-fun-zone/", "globe"), enlink_fa("https://github.com/matt-dray/little-pixel-fun-zone/", "github"), enlink_fa("https://www.rostrum.blog/posts/2024-09-15-shiny-pixel/", "pencil") ), # "Not Balatro", "Drag-and-drop card gaming in R with {sortable}?", paste( enlink_fa("https://matt-dray.github.io/not-balatro/", "globe"), enlink_fa("https://github.com/matt-dray/not-balatro/", "github"), enlink_fa("https://www.rostrum.blog/posts/2024-10-25-not-balatro/", "pencil") ), ) |> knitr::kable() ``` ### Not hosted You'll have to download and run them yourself. ```{r} #| label: shiny-not-hosted #| echo: false tibble::tribble( ~Name, ~Description, ~Links, # "matt-dray.com", "This website", "Quarto, Netlify", paste( enlink_fa("https://www.matt-dray.com/", "globe"), enlink_fa("https://www.github.com/matt-dray/personal-site/", "github"), enlink_fa("https://www.rostrum.blog/posts/2020-12-08-postcard/", "pencil") ), # "Faxcrayon", "A gallery of recreations/remixes/original art", "RMarkdown, {bs4cards}, GitHub Pages", paste( enlink_fa("https://matt-dray.github.io/faxcrayon/", "globe"), enlink_fa("https://www.github.com/matt-dray/faxcrayon/", "github"), enlink_fa("https://www.rostrum.blog/posts/2021-07-25-faxcrayon/", "pencil") ), #
